titles.title: To amend the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act, 1930, to require that perishable agricultural products be labeled or marked as to their country of origin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Risk Management and Specialty Crops.

bill.summary: 12/22/1995--Introduced. Amends the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act, 1930 to: (1) require all retail domestic and imported perishable agricultural commodities to have country of origin labeling; and (2) impose penalties for labeling noncompliance.
